title: New: Colour Coding – Kick
body: **Operator Please** know their way around a pop track, so it makes sense that **Colour Coding**, the side-project of **Chris Holland** and T**im Commandeur**, also embodies the spirit of huge, joyous indie anthems. Having announced themselves in November of last year with the effervescent _Perfect_, the duo are back with the insanely danceable _Kick_. Sure, it’s not breaking boundaries musically, but it’s indie-pop songwriting at it’s utmost enjoyable. Stream _Kick_ below, and check out their debut EP _**Proof**_ which drops later in the year. Kick by Colour Coding
